name: Purlins installed and QA / handover received from main contractor
Liner deck fixed down in every purlin and every pan
Substrate clean, dry, free of debris
VCL installed and covered all surface
VCL lapped with a minimum of 100mm side and end laps
VCL clean, no ponding water, free of debris prior to install
VCL has been cheeked for damages
Boards tightly butted all areas covered
Correct insulation installed as per spec
Correct underlay installed as per specifications
Overlapped a minimum 150mm side laps and 200mm end laps
Joints taped together as per drawings and specifications
Drip edge installed as per drawings and specifications
Laid straight and perpendicular to gutter/purlins
Gutter overhang as per drawings and specifications
Screw pattern according to plan/specs/fixing plan
Expansion joints /slip joints installed with runs longer than 12m colour steel or 8m Ali
Flashings installed as per drawings and specifications and facing away from waterflow
Fixings installed as per drawings and specifications
All installation work completed, checked and reviewed as per specifications
